controller

Interface ClientOrServer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Client, Server

    public interface ClientOrServer
    ClientOrServer interface Will be implemented in either Client or Server class. Has some shared methods for ease of use, so that it can be referred to in other classes using "ClientOrServer parent" and then, for example, running parent.sendMessageToAll(s), from a class that has methods to send messages to other peers.
